# C3BO Balance Patch

Hosting site for high-level battletested Beyond All Reason balance suggestions to improve gameplay based on real ingame cost-performance per unit category.

-------

# Patch objectives:

All the recommended changes together should:
- Bring bot/veh power level a bit closer together.
- Encourage unit compositions at both t1 and t2.
- Help restore power level parity between t2 techtrees and factions.
- Encourage unused units to a reasonable cost/performance expected of the unit category.
- Ensure that units have a degree of weakness to something and a reasonable performance per category.
- Encourage the use of miscellaneous buildings that see no use and enrich the game variety of strategy.

------
# Welcome message
```
!welcome-message https://github.com/Cebolletoth/BAR-Balance/edit/main/README.md Balance patch made by C3BO, see changes in link.

```
------

!bset tweakunits2

!bset tweakunits3

!bset tweakunits4
